phrs.translation: 划分, 分隔, 权限分离, 隔开

sentences.sentence: By nature, people must be able to "label" you or compartmentalize you.
sentences.translation: 从本质上讲，人们会将你贴上“标签”并划分为某一类人加以便区分。

sentences.sentence: Many people often compartmentalize these things and fail to see how they all relate to one another.
sentences.translation: 很多人经常孤立地看待这些事情，看不出它们其实都涉及到另一个。

sentences.sentence: You’d be able to control your presentation of self —and as in the real world, compartmentalize your life.
sentences.translation: 你可以自己控制自己的网页资料—就像在现实世界里一样，规划你的生活。
